#summary How to grab the latest development snapshot of the source code

= Introduction =

All our version control is handled using Mercurial.

= Browsing =

You can browse the online anonymous repository here: http://heavy-horse.co.uk:4000/

= Checking out =

To download the current repository, you need to install [http://www.selenic.com/mercurial/wiki/ Mercurial] (the 'mercurial' package on Linux), or [http://tortoisehg.sourceforge.net/ TortoiseHg] for Windows.

On BSD, Linux or any other UNIX-like system, run: 
{{{ hg clone http://heavy-horse.co.uk:4000/ }}}
